ygData.subject: Warrior rebuttal
ygData.msgSnippet: ... need ... Well gee, if I had the choose so blindly of course I would take the wait time.  However, your question doesn t really address what I m talking
ygData.messageBody:
>>>>>>>More HPs - Lets us take more damage<<<<<
>>
>>A pointless improvement, IMHO. If I'm solo I already have to spend a very
>>long time sitting and waiting for my health to come back. Last thing I
need
>>is to have to wait LONGER.
>
>Would you rather wait LONGER for more HPs to regen or would you prefer
>death?

Well gee, if I had the choose so blindly of course I would take the wait
time. However, your question doesn't really address what I'm talking about.
More often than not, the reason a monster would beat me down is NOT because I
didn't have enough hit points to stand up to it, but because I miss my attack
over and over. Having extra HP only means I get to hang out a little longer
while the creature that's too tough for me to beat makes my demise that much
more painful. This directly relates to 2 of the 3 warrior improvements ideas
I came up with that I think would be much more useful:

1: Increased chance of hitting with an attack (increased over the hybrids
anyway).
2: Remove or change Berzerker Frenzy. It is not a help, it's a hinderance.

I'll reiterate my other one, even though it doesn't relate to the above.

3: Make Kick and Bash/Slam non-mutaually exclusive.

>If you are wounded to a point where you are waiting longer, you would have
>been dead without those extra HPs. Extra HPs also allow you to fight longer
>before having to run. I don't see how anyone could think this is a
>pointless improvement.

Like I said, with Berzerker Frenzy working the way it does, running is rarely
an option. Then again, you might know that had to actually played a warrior
for a decent amount of time.

>If every warrior got 1000 HPs per level, would it still be pointless?

If we over-exaggerated every question like that, would this debate be
pointless?
